about.title: About me
about.description: My name is Szymon Bednarski and I am a Computer Science student at Wroclaw University of Technology. As a 3rd year student, I'm on the verge of obtaining a bachelor's degree. Despite a harsh start, together with my skills growth, I fell in love with web development and decided, that I want to do it for a living. As a part of rest, I love playing the piano, boxing on the other hand helps to release stress and tension. I cannot accept any winter without a ski trip.
